txt.en: Morgoth, Sauron, the Witch-king of Angmar, the terrible Gaunt-lords... all possess the sorcerous power to infuse the remains of the dead with fell spirits in service to the Enemy. Rumour speaks of haunted vales in the realm of Angmar inhabited almost wholly by these spirits and the fell wights they produce....

Whatever power allows these creatures to take form and walk in the realm of the living, you have defied them at every turn. You are determined to destroy the wights wherever you find them and banish the fell spirits which give them unlife.
